item.title: Re-implement handling of touch events
item.description:
From thilo.mu...@gmail.com on July 21, 2012 15:25:34
With the new overlay implementation ( issue #286 ) the existing API has changed. The current code base does not yet offer a way to react on touch events and interact with overlay items. This needs to be added again as many applications require such a feature.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=336

item.contents:
From warwo...@gmail.com on September 20, 2012 05:38:48
I'm keen to see some way to detect various events.
1) Detecting when the map center or zoom level has changed is one feature i need.
2) Obviously, like a lot of other mapsforge users, i require some touch events for OverlayItems.
Thanks.

From schmalsp...@gmail.com on June 03, 2013 10:41:46
Hello, since I tought that more people would like to have the touch in the rewrite branch, here is a litte patch for simple tap.
It is all based on j...@lapoutre.com's Patch but compatible with the latest rewrite. Please remember, it's quick'n'dirty but at least works for a while...
Cheers, Stephan
Attachment: touch.patch
